hero.title: Entrene su mente
hero.tagLine_1: Un retiro abierto para fortalecer su conexión con la madre naturaleza usando la que ya tienes adentro
hero.tagLine_2: sin dogma, sin gurus, sin drogras, solo naturaleza y mente

features.title: Look for the bare necessities
features.subtitle: ♬ ...the simple bare necessities, forget about your worries and your strife ♬

list.beds: Hotel quality beds, sheets and cleaning service
list.food: Regionally grown costarrican food with a vegetarian option, cooked by local woman. Coffee, Te and Fruit station
list.bungalow: Jungle Bungalow with floor to cealing air-tight mosquito screens and a half bathroom.
list.mosquito: Lounge on the pristine beach with lots of included toys for surfing, fishing, playing
list.kitchen: A big ocean front living room, reading room, kitchen with ice maker and dining with great fans
list.price: N&M is a 'not for profit corporation'. We run a tight ship planned to break even EOY
list.beds_d: Good sleep here dependes on carefully selected matress, pillows and sheets for the jungle life. Changed often
list.food_d: Great tasting, locally grown costarrican food, coked by locals woman, for all tastes and minds.
list.bungalow_d: Single, private, sparkling clean bungallow inmersed in the jungle with 1/2 restroom
list.mosquito_d: Bungalows with air-thight floor to cealing screen. Otherwise you won't be able to sleep
list.kitchen_d: A big ocean front living room, reading room, kitchen and dining with great fans
list.price_d: N&M is a 'not for profit corporation'. We run a tight ship planned to break even EOY
